SELECT DISTINCT log_template.template_code AS TCode, log_template.template_group AS TGroup,
log_template.template_definition_en AS TDefinition,
log_template.template_definition_en AS TDefinition,
log_template.template_definition AS TDefinition,
log.v0, log.v1, log.v2, log.v3, log.v4, log.v5, log.v6, log.v7, log.v8, log.v9, log.log_at FROM log_template RIGHT JOIN log ON log_template.id = log.template_id
AND log_template.template_code = #{TCode}
AND log_template.template_group = #{TGroup}
AND (log.log_at BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{DateFrom},'%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{DateTo},'%Y-%m-%d') ) ORDER BY log_at DESC

SELECT log.v0, log.v1, log.v2, log.v3, log.v4, log.v5, log.v6, log.v7, log.v8, log.v9, log.log_at FROM log LEFT JOIN log_template ON log.template_id = log_template.id WHERE log_template.template_code = #{TCode} AND log.v0 = #{User} ORDER BY log.log_at DESC LIMIT #{Limit} OFFSET #{Offset}
